label: BinaryFile
comment: A file representing a data snapshot that is used to infomr the conformity assessment.

datatypeProperties.comment: A name for referenced binary file
The type of file, represented as a MIME type.
A unique identifier (URI) assigned to the product passport. May be a UUID

referencedBy.comment: A reference to the human / printable version of this conformity attestation - typically represented as a PDF document. The document may have more details than are represented in the digital attestation.
A unique identifier (URI) pointing to an image of the product.
The trust mark image awarded by the AB to the CAB to indicate accrediation.
